name: employee-tracker
description: This is a command-line application that a user can use to manage their company's database. This application uses Node.js, Inquirer, and MySQL. ## Usage From the console run: node index.js   ## Credits Zach Smith - [GitHub Profile](https://github.com/Lemelisk27)   ## Questions   If you have any questions you can contact me directly at Lemelisk27@gmail.com. You can also find more of my work on GitHub at [Lemelisk27](https://github.com/Lemelisk27)
